title: A Global-Local Optimization Framework for Simultaneous Multi-Mode Multi-Corner Clock Skew Variation Reduction
authors: K Han, AB Kahng, J Lee, J Li, S Nath -
excerpt: ABSTRACT As combinations of signoff corners grow in modern SoCs, minimization of clock skew variation across corners is important. Large skew variation can cause difficulties in multi-corner timing closure because fixing violations at one corner can lead to violations at  ...
